description.narrative: Bangladesh proposes to build the in -country humanitarian Emergency Food Security Livelihood (EFSL) technical staff capacity, boost the Monitoring Evaluation and Accountability and Learning (MEAL) technical staff capacity and improve partnership accountability and transparency in logistics and finance. Hence, Bangladesh's humanitarian vision proposes to expand Oxfam's technical resources and partner capacity through the recruitment of an EFSL Coordinator, MEAL training and recruitment of logistic officer (roving) and finance officer (roving) to build partner's business skills.

participating-org.narrative: UN United Nations Children's Fund UNICEF
